meanings.definition: A type of fish that resembles an eel.
meanings.sent1: The eelpouts swam gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of eelpouts while snorkeling.
meanings.sent3: The eelpouts decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed behind her like the movements of eelpouts in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium showcased the mesmerizing dance of the eelpouts.

meanings.sent1: We caught many eelpouts during our fishing trip.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen proudly displayed their catch of eelpouts.
meanings.sent3: The eelpouts gathered for a meeting to discuss their underwater adventures.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with eelpouts, creating a sea of shimmering scales.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with customers eager to buy fresh eelpouts.
